q: Does this 1) execute multi-phase objective 2) handle corpse/Inventory 3) progress dungeon level?
description: Defines 'descend_safely' function: 1) Wield silver saber (w) 2) Apply stethoscope to door (a + l) 3) Fight gelatinous cube (F + l) 4) Loot corpse (,) 5) Descend stairs (>). Implements cautious progression to next level.
